title: EningE vandirundu ennennamO
sahitya:
EningE vandu vandirundu ennennamO kaNNanai vaNNanai pADurAi ellAm arinda viLi vaNDE


anupallavi

  vAnODu maNNaiyaLandAnai en manamODu uravADi 
kaLavADinAnai vAnarak-koDiyOn tOzhanAnAnai
			(madhyamakAlam) 
mana vAsal enra ellAm turandu ariyAdu ninra aDiyOrgaL mundi


caraNam    vaDa mAmadurai nagar vazhiyidO pAru madhukara vAyishai nidamuravAgiDa vaNDE 
vaNDE parandODu angE pA�.Du maDanallAr angAyiram Ayiram mAdhavan uravenum 
kAdaliyar uNDu vaNDE vaNDE parandODu angE pADu malaraDit-tEnai vanamaLittAnai 
manamarindAnai vAyArap-pADu am-mangaiyar inkitamarindu unakkAnadu sheivAr adaippAru
